result.execSummary:
The defendant Matthew J Kucken was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disordery Conduct. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Matthew J Kucken

records.addlTxt:
Amended Order on Disposition Stipulation

ec/pc: DA, Atty Huebner, Def with ettp slip (7/15/22--ma)

Pre-trial conference on June 29, 2022 at 10:40 am.
Status conference on July 29, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

[MK] case called at 1:40pm 
Defendant Matthew J Kucken in court with Attorney Karl Huebner. DA Monica Hall appears for the State of Wisconsin.
Service of Complaint admitted, reading waived, the charge and maximum penalties are recited.
Plea of  "not guilty" is entered; speedy trial waived by the Defendant
DA Hall verifies victim rights compliance, noting that the victims are present.  
recess 1:44pm. 
[off record: in response to the clerk's inquiry, Mr. Kucken indicates that the 437 Raintree Drive address is current]

NEXT:  (1) Pretrial Conference on June 29th at 10:40am,  (2)  Status Conference on July 29th at 3:30pm
Adjourned initial appearance on April 7, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

[ml] Case called at 2:34PM
[All Appearances via Zoom]
Defendant Matthew J Kucken appears. DA Monica Hall appears for the State of Wisconsin.
The Court finds that the Zoom video connection is sight and sound sufficient.
DA Hall verifies Victim Rights Compliance.

The Court notes that the Defendant is eligible for the Public Defender's Office, but an attorney from their office could not appear today. The Court sets this matter over for a Status of Counsel to allow for more time for the Public Defender's Office to appoint counsel.

The Court inquires if there a Victim Present that wishes to be heard. An alleged victim makes a statement.

recess 2:37PM

NEXT: Status Conference (also Status of Counsel) on 04/07 at 1:30PM

State Public Defender Determination of Financial Eligibility - The above-named applicant is eligible for State Public Defender
representation. The eligibility determination was made on 1/21/2022. No attorney is
available to attend the hearing scheduled for 2/4/22 .
Initial appearance on February 4, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

[MK; Appearances are by Zoom Conference] 
case called at 1:19pm 
Defendant Matthew J. Kucken appears.  Public Service Special Prosecutor Melanie Flint appears for the State of Wisconsin. 
The Court finds that the video-connection is sight and sound sufficient. 
Attorney Flint verifies victim rights compliance.  
Mr. Kucken indicates that he has not received a copy of the Criminal Complaint.  The Raintree Drive, Fort Atkinson address is verified as being current.
The Court requires Mr. Kucken to telephone the Jefferson Public Defender's Office by 4:00pm today to apply for representation.  
The court continues the $150 Cash Bond (already posted) with added conditions: 
--not to commit any acts or threats of violence
--to take medications as precribed
--the Court requires Mr. Kucken to report to the Jefferson Clerk of Courts by 4:00pm today to sign the Amended Bond.  
recess 1:26pm. 

NEXT: Initial Appearance (and status-of-counsel) on February 4th at 2:30pm by Zoom

Amended Bond.  Conditions of Bond include: 
--not to commit any acts or threats of violence
--to take medications as precribed
--the Court requires Mr. Kucken to report to the Jefferson Clerk of Courts by 4:00pm today to sign the Amended Bond.

Victim Witness Key
The original document name was titled: Victim Witness Key
The original history event date is: 01-18-2022
